page.title: 02Before and after school
page.content: In the morning I usually get up at 7.20. I wash , get dressed and at 7.30 I have my breakfast. My breakfast usually consists of cornflakes, toast, a boiled egg and a cup of tea. After breakfast I go and practice on the piano. At 8.25 I go to our bus stop with my brother. Our bus arrives at 8.35. On the main road we have a good view of the fields. Coming into Leaden Roding there are quite a lot of houses on the left hand side, on the right hand side is the Country Shop.At 8.55 we arrive at the school,and we go down the path into the playground. At 3.00 we go back home.At home I have a drink of milk and some biscuits.I get changed and then go for a ride on my bicycle.I watch the television for a while and then have my tea.At 7.45 I have my bath and at 8.00 I go to bed.Iread for a while and go to sleep.
